title: Penne Penne Azhaigiren Lyrics Irumbu Kuthirai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Penne Penne
Singers: G.V.Prakash Kumar,
Bhavatharini, Yazhini
Music: G.V.Prakash Kumar
Movie: Irumbu Kuthirai
Lyrics: Thamarai

Penne Penne azhaigiren
andril aagi azhugiren
Penne Penne neeyum engae
endre thaedi thigaikkiren

Nee sollaadhaal mozhiyillai
nee sellaadhadhaal vazhiyillai
nee paaraadhadhaal oliyillai
nee thaaradhadhaal nizhal illai

Uyir ponaal pogattum
ippodhey paarthaaga vendum
naan unnai unnai.

Oh Penne Penne azhaigiren
andril aagi azhugiren

Naanum unnai kaanum varai
en vazhvil yedho kurai
unnai kanda annaal mudhal
andraadum moondraam pirai

Kaigal serkka, kangal korkka
naan ketteney anbil serai
Paarkkum podhey paavai seelai
kaanaamal pona kadhai.

Ennai vaa en raani
kettu ododi pakkathil vandhaen.
Kangal poi sonnadhaal
kaanal neerai thaan naan
paarthu nindren.

Saalai oraththil poothendral
roobaththil nee vandhaai
naan thaaney pullaangulal

Kaattrai thoodhaaga naan vida
kanne un koondhal kodhi paaraadho.
Un kannin mai poosi nee vida
kaattrum pennaagi ingu vaaraadho

Moonu Munooru aandugal
ondraai naam vazhndha niyabagam
Yengi naan petra en varam
haiyyo ippodhu yaaridam.

Unnai paaraadhu
muththam thaaraadhu
ini thoongaadhu en kangaley.

Penne Penne azhaigiren
andril aagi azhugiren
Penne Penne neeyum engae
endre thaedi thigaikkiren

Nee sollaadhaal mozhiyillai
nee sellaadhadhaal vazhiyillai
nee paaraadhadhaal oliyillai
nee thaaradhadhaal nizhal illai

Uyir ponaal pogattum
ippodhey paarthaaga vendum
naan unnai unnai.
